### [C Variadic Functions](/documentation/swift/cvalistpointer#C-Variadic-Functions)

[`func withVaList<R>([any CVarArg], (CVaListPointer) -> R) -> R`](/documentation/swift/withvalist(_:_:))Invokes the given closure with a C `va_list` argument derived from the given array of arguments.[`protocol CVarArg`](/documentation/swift/cvararg)A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.[`func getVaList([any CVarArg]) -> CVaListPointer`](/documentation/swift/getvalist(_:))Returns a `CVaListPointer` that is backed by autoreleased storage, built from the given array of arguments.
